content: I'm glad you found the resources helpful! As you explore the world of uilleann piping, you might also want to consider attending traditional Irish music sessions or festivals where you can hear the pipes played live and meet other pipers. It's a great way to learn from others, get feedback on your playing, and connect with the community. Additionally, you might want to explore the history and cultural significance of the uilleann pipes in Irish traditional music, which can deepen your appreciation and understanding of the instrument.
